resources.string: Log your own workout from scratch
Sample workouts from some of your favorite pros
No content yet, log a workout to get started!
When shooting, try to shoot one fluid motion
When starting your workout, start close to the rim and focus on technique before increasing range
There is no single perfect form for every shooter, find what works best for you and stick to it!
On each miss, focus on what went wrong and how to correct that
Ensure that your technique does not breakdown as you fatigue
Try filming yourself shooting. It may highlight issues you don\'t realize are happening
When doing moving shooting drills, focus on maintaining balance while shooting
Try and lock your eyes on the rim as soon as possible
Confidence is key.\nFocus on positive reinforcement and build confidence through practice
Consistency is the most important attribute in becoming a good shooter
Get in shape.\nYou need to be able to shoot after playing intense defense
Practice at full speed.\nYour exercises should replicate in-game scenarios
Don\'t be discouraged by missed shots. Always focus on the next shot
If you get discouraged, reflect on your progress and how far you\'ve come
Surround yourself with better shooters and players than yourself
Focusing on sleep is one of the most important aspects to your performance
Focusing on developing a fast release to get shots off easier in games
You can disable tips at any time on the settings screen
